verses.verse: זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This סֵ֔פֶר <S%H5612><s%> [is] the book תּוֹלְדֹ֖ת <S%H8435><s%> of the generations אָדָ֑ם <S%H121><s%> of Adam בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the day בְּרֹ֤א <S%H1254><s%> created אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> that God אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> man בִּדְמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> in the likeness אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> made אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> Male וּנְקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> and female בְּרָאָ֑ם <S%H1254><s%> created וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> he them and blessed אֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> them and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמָם֙ <S%H8034><s%> their name אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> Adam בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הִבָּֽרְאָֽם׃ <S%H1254><s%> when they were created ס

וַֽיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived אָדָ֗ם <S%H121><s%> And Adam שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וּמְאַת֙ <S%H3967><s%> an hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בִּדְמוּת֖וֹ <S%H1823><s%> [a son] in his own likeness כְּצַלְמ֑וֹ <S%H6754><s%> after his image וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שֵֽׁת׃ <S%H8352><s%> Seth

וַיִּֽהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> Then יְמֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> And the days אָדָ֗ם <S%H121><s%> of Adam אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he had begotten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֔ת <S%H8352><s%> Seth שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> were eight מֵאֹ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and he begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וַיִּֽהְי֞וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֤י <S%H3117><s%> And all the days אָדָם֙ <S%H121><s%> that Adam אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after חַ֔י <S%H2416><s%> age תְּשַׁ֤ע <S%H8672><s%> were nine מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and he died ס

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived שֵׁ֕ת <S%H8352><s%> And Seth חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּמְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H583><s%> Enos

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived שֵׁ֗ת <S%H8352><s%> And Seth אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱנ֔וֹשׁ <S%H583><s%> Enos שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seven שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> And all the days שֵׁ֔ת <S%H8352><s%> of Seth שְׁתֵּ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּתְשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> were nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and he died ס

וַֽיְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> lived אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <S%H583><s%> And Enos תִּשְׁעִ֣ים <S%H8673><s%> ninety שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֵינָֽן׃ <S%H7018><s%> Cainan

וַֽיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <S%H583><s%> And Enos אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֵינָ֔ן <S%H7018><s%> Cainan חֲמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> fif עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And all the days אֱנ֔וֹשׁ <S%H583><s%> of Enos חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּתְשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> were nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and he died ס

וַֽיְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> lived קֵינָ֖ן <S%H7018><s%> And Cainan שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַֽהֲלַלְאֵֽל׃ <S%H4111><s%> Mahalaleel

וַיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived קֵינָ֗ן <S%H7018><s%> And Cainan אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַֽהֲלַלְאֵ֔ל <S%H4111><s%> Mahalaleel אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> and forty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And all the days קֵינָ֔ן <S%H7018><s%> of Cainan עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> and ten שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּתְשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> were nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and he died ס

וַֽיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived מַֽהֲלַלְאֵ֔ל <S%H4111><s%> And Mahalaleel חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years וְשִׁשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8346><s%> sixty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָֽרֶד׃ <S%H3382><s%> Jared

וַֽיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived מַֽהֲלַלְאֵ֗ל <S%H4111><s%> And Mahalaleel אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֶ֔רֶד <S%H3382><s%> Jared שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וַיִּהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And all the days מַהֲלַלְאֵ֔ל <S%H4111><s%> of Mahalaleel חָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five וְתִשְׁעִים֙ <S%H8673><s%> ninety שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> were eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and he died ס

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived יֶ֕רֶד <S%H3382><s%> And Jared שְׁתַּ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וְשִׁשִּׁ֛ים <S%H8346><s%> sixty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּמְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲנֽוֹךְ׃ <S%H2585><s%> Enoch

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived יֶ֗רֶד <S%H3382><s%> And Jared אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲנ֔וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> Enoch שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> And all the days יֶ֔רֶד <S%H3382><s%> of Jared שְׁתַּ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וְשִׁשִּׁים֙ <S%H8346><s%> sixty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּתְשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> were nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and he died פ

וַֽיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived חֲנ֔וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> And Enoch חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five וְשִׁשִּׁ֖ים <S%H8346><s%> sixty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְתוּשָֽׁלַח׃ <S%H4968><s%> Methuselah

וַיִּתְהַלֵּ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked חֲנ֜וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> And Enoch אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְתוּשֶׁ֔לַח <S%H4968><s%> Methuselah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> the father בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And all the days חֲנ֑וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> of Enoch חָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five וְשִׁשִּׁים֙ <S%H8346><s%> sixty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> were three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיִּתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked חֲנ֖וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> And Enoch אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> with God וְאֵינֶ֕נּוּ <S%H369><s%> else כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> and he [was] not for God פ

וַיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived מְתוּשֶׁ֔לַח <S%H4968><s%> And Methuselah שֶׁ֧בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seven וּשְׁמֹנִ֛ים <S%H8084><s%> eighty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּמְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לָֽמֶךְ׃ <S%H3929><s%> Lamech

וַֽיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived מְתוּשֶׁ֗לַח <S%H4968><s%> And Methuselah אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֶ֔מֶךְ <S%H3929><s%> Lamech שְׁתַּ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וּשְׁמוֹנִים֙ <S%H8084><s%> eighty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּשְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וַיִּהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And all the days מְתוּשֶׁ֔לַח <S%H4968><s%> of Methuselah תֵּ֤שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> were nine וְשִׁשִּׁים֙ <S%H8346><s%> sixty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּתְשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> and nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and he died פ

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived לֶ֕מֶךְ <S%H3929><s%> And Lamech שְׁתַּ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וּשְׁמֹנִ֛ים <S%H8084><s%> eighty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּמְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> a son

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> And he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֛וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name נֹ֖חַ <S%H5146><s%> Noah לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying זֶ֞ה֠ <S%H2088><s%> This יְנַחֲמֵ֤נוּ <S%H5162><s%> This [same] shall comfort מִֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֙נוּ֙ <S%H4639><s%> us concerning our work וּמֵעִצְּב֣וֹן <S%H6093><s%> and toil יָדֵ֔ינוּ <S%H3027><s%> of our hands מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> because הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> of the ground אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֵֽרְרָ֖הּ <S%H779><s%> hath cursed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD
